text: læa cng raluk thung khna thi rea di xea khaman sayya cak wngswan xis rx xi l wa phwk cea ca txng mi khearph sakkara nxk ca kxallxhˌ theanan læa cng tha di tx bida marda yati thi kıl chid dek kaphra læa phu khadsn læa cng phudca kæ pheuxn mnusʹy xyang di læa cng darng wi sung kar lahmad læa cng chara sa kat tæ læw phwk cea k phinhlanghı nxkcak pheiyng leknxy nı hmu phwk cea theanan læa phwk cea k kalang phinhlanghı xyu
